name: MYC_MESG_ALC_DPW
description: This table contains patient answers to the "number of alcoholic drinks per week" question submitted in a history questionnaire.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALC_DRINKS_PER_WK
columns.description: The value entered by the patient for number of alcoholic drinks per week.

columns.name: ALC_DRINK_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The types of alcoholic drinks entered by the patient.
